alert.note: Alert for Estill; Jackson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 19 at 4:59PM EDT until May 19 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM EDT FOR WESTERN OWSLEY...SOUTHWESTERN ESTILL...NORTHEASTERN JACKSON AND SOUTHWESTERN LEE COUNTIES... At 459 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Blanton Flats, or 8 miles north of McKee, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Alumbaugh, Leighton and Evelyn. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
